definitions.text: a ditch dug as a fortification having a parapet of the excavated earth
a long steep-sided depression in the ocean floor
any long ditch cut in the ground

examples: This impinges on my rights as an individual
This matter entrenches on other domains

definitions.text: set, plant, or bury in a trench
cut a trench in, as for drainage
examples: ditch the land to drain it
The National Guardsmen were sent out to trench
